wqbc 0.3.1.9002

  • Changelog

Lookup Variables

Source: R/lookup.R
lookup_variables.Rd

Returns recognised water quality variables. If codes = NULL the function returns all recognised variable names. Otherwise it looks up the matching variables from codes. Whether or not the codes are compressed or expanded is unimportant.

lookup_variables(
  codes = NULL,
  messages = getOption("wqbc.messages", default = TRUE)
)

Arguments

codes

An optional character vector of codes to look up variables.
messages

A flag indicating whether to print messages.

See also

lookup_limits and expand_ems_codes

Examples

lookup_variables()
#>   [1] "1,1,2-Trichloroethene (Trichloroethylene) Total"                                   
#>   [2] "1,1,2,2-Tetrachloroethene (Tetrachloroethylene, Perchlorethylene) Total"

#> Replaced 'AL-D' with 'Aluminum Dissolved', 'AS-T' with 'Arsenic Total' and 'B--T' with 'Boron Total'.
#> Failed to replace 'KRYP'.
#> [1] "Aluminum Dissolved" "Arsenic Total"      "Boron Total"
